name: setlocale
readme:
node-setlocale
==============

This is a simple wrapper module for setlocale(3).

Synopsis
--------

    var setlocale = require('setlocale');
    setlocale.setlocale(setlocale.LC_ALL, '');

Install
-------

    % npm install node-setlocale

Build
-----

    % node-gyp conifgure build install

Test
----

    % node test.js
